item.title: Shoes new methods arc and cap
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
_why showed us a few tips about new methods on the Shoes ML. Wonderful combination of the method animate!

Do run the below code, will start drawing the colorful circle! B-)

# arcs.rbShoes.app :width => 200, :height => 100, :title => 'Arcs' do fill green.to_s..yellow.to_s, :angle => 45 stroke red.to_s..blue.to_s, :angle => 90 strokewidth 10 cap :round a = animate 12 do |i|   @c.remove if @c   r = i * (PI * 0.01)   @c = arc 100, 50, 180, 60, 0, i * (PI * 0.01)   a.remove if r >= TWO_PI endend
